programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000
programme.desc: Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.

programme.title: Shakma
programme.desc: A recreational "Dungeons and Dragons" type of game among pre-med students turns into a bloodbath when the baboon subject of experiments goes on a killing rampage.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp [VHS Vault]
programme.desc: After a terrible boating accident killed her family, shy Angela Baker is sent to Camp Arawak. Shortly after her arrival a series of bizarre and violent "accidents" begin to claim the lives of various campers.

programme.title: Terror Beneath the Sea
programme.desc: While covering a test of guided torpedoes, two reporters discover that there is a race of fish-men living under the sea.

programme.title: Lords of the Deep
programme.desc: America's first self-contained undersea laboratory is the pride of the nation. What wasn't expected was the inhabitants of an undiscovered world.

programme.title: Exorcism
programme.desc: A young woman participates (unknowingly) in a satanic ceremony and gets possessed by the spirit of her late father.

programme.title: Scanners II: The New Order
programme.desc: A breed of humans with dangerously powerful telepathic abilities are recruited by a corrupt police commander.

programme.title: The Night Of The Sorcerers [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: An African expedition encounters vampires at the site of an ancient sacrificial altar.

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: After murdering his entire family, a man remarries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town.

programme.title: Stepfather II
programme.desc: The Stepfather impersonates a marriage counselor and manages to win over a patient and her young son.

programme.title: Stepfather III
programme.desc: A suspicious youth utilises his computer skills to learn the true identity of the menacing figure romancing his mother.

programme.title: Slaughterhouse Rock
programme.desc: A college student visits Alcatraz with his friends after having recurring nightmares of a rock band that was killed there.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: A young girl struggles to survive after a group of home invaders break in to to steal her family's priceless artwork.

programme.title: Carnival of Souls
programme.desc: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

programme.title: MST3K: Blood Waters Of Dr. Z
programme.desc: Seeking revenge against those responsible for stripping him of his tenure and the denial of human research subjects, Dr. Z mutates himself into a half-human-half-fish-like creature!
